page.title: 13LIFE FOR A GIRL AGED 11
page.content: Sacha, an 11 year old girl, lives with her parents and 16 year old brother in an unusually large house, called Pyebirch Manor. She gets up at 6.30am for a breakfast of toast and jam. Her mother is on a rota of parents who transport their children to Stafford schools. Sacha attends an Independent preparatory school. Her favourite subjects are French and Geography. At home Sacha sometimes works in the garden for her pocket money: 70 pence a week. She does her music practice (harp and flute) and homework and helps with the dinner. Her favourite meal is sausages, baked beans and mashed potatoes. To relax Sacha watches television - her favourite programmes are the soap operas, Dallas and Dynasty. She enjoys pop music, especially the group Frankie goes to Hollywood.
